profile.name: Sébastien Eustace
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Sendgrid | Python Developer & Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for building scalable, efficient, and maintainable systems. Proficient in Python, with expertise in database sharding, command line interfaces, and timezone management.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Sendgrid
description: Designed and implemented metadata-updater project using Python and CliKit.
Developed and maintained clikit projects, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on various open-source projects, including [repo1], [repo2], and [repo3].
